textTemplates.name: BB_TextTemplate_EN_Body_MP_Saved
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Were delighted to inform you that, thanks to your hard work, youve improved your {!$Record.Issue_KPI__c} and are now in compliance with Back Markets quality standards!


Your monitoring period for the {!$Record.Issue_KPI__c} ends today and your BuyBack purchase limitations will be lifted as long as youre not subject to any other BuyBack restrictions.


To avoid any monitoring periods in the future, visit the Seller Support Center to review the process, track your performance via the BuyBack insights dashboard in your Back Office,  or reach out to your Back Market point of contact with any questions. 


Thanks for your partnership,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: BB_TextTemplate_FR_Body_MP_Saved
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Nous sommes ravis de vous informer que, grce vos efforts, vous avez amlior votre {!$Record.Issue_KPI__c} et que vous tes maintenant en conformit avec les normes de qualit Back Market !


Votre monitoring period se termine donc aujourd'hui pour votre {!$Record.Issue_KPI__c} et votre limite de reprises est leve, sous rserve que vous ne soyez sujet aucune autre restriction de reprises.


Nous comptons sur vous pour poursuivre les amliorations que vous avez apportes.


Afin dviter toute monitoring period lavenir, nous vous recommandons de consulter rgulirement le Seller Support Center pour le Buyback et de suivre vos performances en qualit laide du dashboard Qualit Buyback disponible dans votre back-office. Votre contact Back Market reste bien entendu votre disposition pour toute question complmentaire. 


Cordialement,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_Chargers_ENBody_LastChance
textTemplates.text:
Dear Merchant,
As mentioned in our previous notice, you were notified of several cases of potential hazardous chargers distributed on our platform and were requested to provide necessary documentation for us to certify their conformity. Unfortunately, you failed to provide the requested documentation. Due to these shortcomings, and according to article 17 of our Terms and Conditions, the daily number of your sales will be limited to 30% of your average daily sales volume over the last 30 days as of today.
You are, however, granted a final period of 30 days to provide us with the required documents. If you fail to provide the requested information by this due date, we will have no choice but to cease all collaboration with your company and close your account, as provided for in article 18 of our Terms and Conditions.
We hope that we can work with you to resolve your situation. As a reminder, the purpose of this procedure is to ensure the chargers you provide on our platform are compliant with the International Safety Standard IEC 62368-1 to guarantee customer safety.
As a reminder, the requested documentation is as follows: If you are providing original/refurbished chargers: The documentation of your unitary control process If you are providing chargers sourced from manufacturers: The full test report LVD for that charger model: The test report LVD should be in accordance with the standard IEC 62368-1 (the new mandatory standard since Dec 2020). The following 45 pictures of the specified charger [jpeg format required, size <5MB] 1. All sides with some markingmarking must be readable 2. One side of the charger, if not displayed in the first photo 3. Top side with the DC plug 4. Populated PCB (top side) 5. Populated PCB (bottom side) The charger model should correspond to the one of the concerned order ID.
Please find in the dedicated article on the Merchant Support Center (find link here at the bottom) examples of what is considered adequate information.
Please note that we can help you secure high-quality sourcing (including charging blocks/chargers certified by International Safety Standards (IEC 62368-1). If you are interested, feel free to reach out to your Back Market point of contact for more information.
Please consider this email as a second formal notice to communicate the aforementioned information, with all legal consequences attached.
Best regards,
The Back Market Team
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Charger-compliance-with-International-Safety-Standard-IEC-62368-1

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_Chargers_ENSubject_LastChance
textTemplates.text: Last chance for Approval process - Hazardous charger

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_Chargers_FRBody_LastChance
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour {!$Record.Business_Name__c},
Faisant suite notre prcdent e-mail, nous vous avons signal plusieurs cas de chargeurs dfectueux vendus par votre socit sur notre plateforme, et nous vous avons demand de fournir les documents pouvant attester de leur conformit. Force est de constater que vous n'avez pas fourni les documents sollicits. Dans ces conditions, et conformment l'article 17 de nos Conditions Gnrales Vendeurs, le nombre quotidien de vos ventes sera limit 30% du volume quotidien moyen de vos ventes au cours des 30 derniers jours compter de ce jour.
Vous bnficiez toutefois d'un dernier dlai de 30 jours pour nous fournir les documents requis. Si vous ne fournissez pas les informations demandes dici cette chance, nous n'aurons d'autre choix que de cesser toute collaboration avec votre entreprise et de clturer votre compte, conformment l'article 18 de nos Conditions Gnrales Vendeurs. Nous esprons pouvoir compter sur votre collaboration pour rsoudre cette situation. Pour rappel, le but de cette procdure est de s'assurer que les chargeurs que vous mettez disposition sur notre plateforme sont conformes la norme internationale de scurit IEC 62368-1, afin de garantir la scurit des consommateurs.
Pour mmoire, les documents requis sont les suivants : Si vous livrez des chargeurs originaux/rpars : La documentation de votre processus de contrle unitaire Si vous livrez des chargeurs provenant de fabricants : Le rapport de test LVD complet pour ce modle de chargeur : le rapport de test doit tre conforme la norme IEC 62368-1 (la nouvelle norme obligatoire depuis dcembre 2020). 4-5 photos suivantes du chargeur spcifi [au format jpeg, taille <5MB]. 1. Tous les cts portant un marquage - le marquage doit tre lisible. 2. Un ct du chargeur, s'il n'apparat pas sur la premire photo 3. Face suprieure avec la prise USB 4. Carte lectronique (face suprieure) 5. Carte lectronique (face infrieure) Le modle de chargeur doit correspondre celui de la commande concerne. Veuillez trouver dans larticle ddi de notre centre d'assistance marchands, le Merchant Support Center, des exemples de ce qui est considr comme une documentation recevable (cf. lien en fin de mail).
Veuillez noter que nous pouvons vous aider garantir un approvisionnement de qualit (y compris des blocs de charge/chargeurs certifis par les normes de scurit internationales (IEC 62368-1). Si vous tes intress, n'hsitez pas contacter votre point de contact Back Market pour plus d'informations. Veuillez considrer ce courriel comme la seconde et dernire mise en demeure de communiquer les informations susmentionnes, avec toutes les consquences juridiques qui en dcoulent.
Bien cordialement, Back Market
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Conformit-des-chargeurs-aux-normes-de-scurit-IEC-62368-1

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_Chargers_FRSubject_LastChance
textTemplates.text: Last chance for Approval process - Hazardous charger

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_Body_Great_Debt
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


We are sorry to notice that you have a negative balance in your Back Market wallet superior to {!$Record.Currency__c}10k.


As a consequence, we hereby notify you, in accordance with article 18.2 of our sellers general terms and conditions, that, unless you regularize your account by paying the invoice available in the invoice tab of your Back Office on the Back Markets account (please specify your PK number and the invoice number as the reason for payment), we will close your seller account in 30 days as from today and our collaboration shall terminate.


After this 30-days period, you will therefore not be able to sell nor to buy back products on our websites. Of course, this notice period is subject to your strict respect of our general terms and conditions and of the Charter. As from tomorrow and until you regularize your account, your sale will be limited to 1 per day.


We remind you that all orders placed on our websites before the closure of your seller account must be executed in accordance with our general terms and conditions and the Charter.


As regards to after sale services and warranties, as from today, we will process all of the Buyers requests and complaints relating to you in your name and on your behalf, under the conditions set forth under articles 13 and 14 of our general terms and conditions for sellers.


Best regards,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_Body_Limitation_Lift
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


Following our previous communication notifying you of a negative balance on your Back Market wallet superior to 10k{!$Record.Currency__c}, we notice that it decreased to a negative balance inferior to 5k{!$Record.Currency__c}. As a consequence, we hereby inform you that we are lifting the 1 sale per day limitation on your sales, and are reverting to the previous applicable limitation of {!$Record.Business_Name__r.LimitationBeforeAlert__c} sales per day.


We however kindly ask you again to regularize your account by paying the invoice available in the invoice tab of your Back Office. Please use the Back Market bank details to make such payment.


Please be informed that according to our general terms and conditions, if your account is not regularized before the end of the 30-day delay mentioned in our previous email, Back Market may close your seller account and take all legal actions to recover this amount plus interests for late payment and any applicable penalties.


Best regards,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_Body_MP_Failed_Policy_Violation
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Since you entered a Probation period for policy violations on {!hasBegunOn}, your account continues to be in violation.


As a result, Back Market might close your account as outlined in article 19.2 of the Sellers Terms and Conditions. Your sales account will be limited until you correct the policy violations or until your account is closed. For now, your sales account is limited to {!$Record.AlertLimitation__c} sales per day or approximately 30% of your most recent 30-day sales average unless youre subject to a lower restriction. 


For more information about the policy violation process, read this Seller Support Center article or reach out to your Back Market point of contact. 


Thank you, 

The Back Market team

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_Body_MP_Saved
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Were delighted to inform you that, thanks to your hard work, youve improved your {!$Record.Issue_KPI__c} and are now in compliance with Back Markets quality standards!


Your Monitoring period for the {!$Record.Issue_KPI__c} ends today and your sales limitations will be lifted as long as youre not subject to any other sales restrictions.


To avoid any Monitoring periods in the future, visit the Seller Support Center to review the process or reach out to your Back Market point of contact with any questions. 


Thanks for your partnership,

The Back Market team

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_Body_MP_Saved_CSAT_LateResponse
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Congratulations, you have reached the goal for the {!$Record.Issue_KPI__c} and are now in compliance with our quality standards! 


Your probation period ends today for the {!$Record.Issue_KPI__c} and your sales limitation will be lifted, provided that you are not subject to any other sales restriction.


We are pleased with the improvements youve made and are counting on you to continue them. To stay updated on the probation period process to ensure your account is always in compliance, please refer to the Merchant Support Center article here. Additionally, your Back Market seller success manager is available to answer any remaining questions you may have. 


Great work!


Sincerely,

Your Back Market team

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_Body_MP_Saved_Policy_Violation
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Congratulations! Youre now fully compliant with Back Markets Quality Charter. Your Probation period for policy violations ends today.


To make sure youre always in compliance with our policies, read this Seller Support Center article or reach out to your Back Market point of contact. 


Nice work,

The Back Market team

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_EN_US_Body_Debt_Saved
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


We are delighted to see that you went back to having a positive balance in your Back Market wallet. Thank you for your efforts to regularize your account.

We request you to ensure that your balance remains positive going forward. Thanks in advance.


Best regards,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_Body_Debt_Saved
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour,


Nous avons le plaisir de constater que votre porte-monnaie virtuel prsente de nouveau un solde positif. Merci pour vos efforts pour rgulariser votre situation.

Nous vous prions de rester vigilants ce que votre balance reste positive lavenir. En vous remerciant par avance.


Cordialement,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_Body_great_debt
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour,


Nous avons le regret de constater que votre porte-monnaie virtuel prsente un solde ngatif de plus de 10k.


Par consquent, nous vous notifions par la prsente, conformment l'article 18.2 de nos conditions gnrales vendeurs, que si vous ne rgularisez pas la situation en payant la facture disponible dans l'onglet facture de votre Back office sur le RIB de Back Market (merci de prciser votre numro PK et le numro de la facture comme motif de paiement), nous clturerons votre compte vendeur lexpiration dune priode de 30 jours, et notre collaboration prendra dfinitivement fin.


Aprs cette priode de 30 jours, vous ne pourrez alors plus ni vendre sur nos Sites, ni procder la reprise de produits via nos Sites. Bien entendu, ce pravis est accord sous rserve du strict respect, compter de ce jour, de nos Conditions Gnrales Vendeurs et de la Charte en vigueur. A compter de demain et jusqu la rgularisation de votre situation, vos ventes seront limites 1 vente par jour.


Nous vous rappelons que toute commande ralise sur nos Sites avant la date darrt des ventes doit tre gre selon les rgles dcrites dans nos Conditions Gnrales Vendeurs et notre Charte Qualit.


Par ailleurs, concernant les garanties et SAV en cours, nous nous substituons vous et traiterons lintgralit des demandes ou rclamations dAcheteurs vous concernant, en votre nom et pour votre compte, compter de ce jour, dans les conditions des articles 13 et 14 de nos conditions gnrales vendeurs.


Cordialement,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_Body_Limitation_Lift
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour,


Suite notre prcdente communication vous notifiant dun solde ngatif de plus de 10k{!$Record.Currency__c} sur votre porte-monnaie virtuel, nous constatons que celui-ci est revenu un solde ngatif de moins de 5k{!$Record.Currency__c}. Par consquent, nous vous informons que nous levons la limitation 1 vente par jour de vos ventes, et appliquons la prcdente limitation applicable {!$Record.Business_Name__r.LimitationBeforeAlert__c} ventes par jour.


Nous vous prions toutefois de bien vouloir rgulariser votre situation dans son intgralit en payant la facture disponible dans l'onglet facture de votre Back office. Vous trouverez sur ce lien le RIB de Back Market sur lequel raliser votre paiement. Nous vous remercions de prciser votre numro PK et le numro de la facture comme motif de paiement.


Nous attirons votre attention sur le fait que, conformment nos conditions gnrales, faute de rgularisation de votre compte avant le dlai de 30 jours vis dans notre email prcdent, Back Market pourra clore votre compte vendeur et mettra en uvre toute action judiciaire pour recouvrer cette somme, outre tout intrt de retard et toutes pnalits applicables.


Cordialement,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_Body_MP_Failed_Policy_Violation
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Depuis votre entre en Probation Period en raison de Policy Violations le {!hasBegunOn}, votre Compte Vendeur continue dtre en violation de nos rgles.


Par consquent, nous pouvons clore votre Compte Vendeur, comme le prvoit larticle 19.2 de nos CGV, et votre compte sera limit {!$Record.AlertLimitation__c} ventes par jour soit environ 30% de votre volume de ventes quotidien moyen ralis au cours des 30 derniers jours compter de ce jour (sauf si vous avez dj une restriction plus basse) jusqu ce que vous remdiez la situation, ou jusqu la date effective de la fermeture de votre compte le cas chant.


Nous vous encourageons consulter le Seller Support Center pour plus d'informations sur le processus de Policy Violation ou contactez votre point de contact Back Market si vous avez des questions. 


Merci,

Lquipe Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_Body_MP_Saved
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Nous avons le plaisir de vous informer que, grce votre travail, vous avez amlior votre {!$Record.Issue_KPI__c} et tes maintenant en conformit avec les standards de qualit Back Market!


Votre Monitoring period se termine aujourd'hui pour votre indicateur {!$Record.Issue_KPI__c} et votre limite de vente est leve,  sous rserve que vous ne soyez sujet aucune autre restriction de vente.


Pour viter toute Monitoring period l'avenir, visitez le Seller Support Center pour revoir le processus ou adressez-vous votre point de contact de Back Market pour toute question.  


Cordialement,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_Body_MP_Saved_CSAT_LateResponse
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Flicitations, vous avez atteint l'objectif fix pour lindicateur {!$Record.Issue_KPI__c} et vous tes maintenant en conformit avec nos normes de qualit!


Votre Probation Period se termine aujourd'hui pour le {!$Record.Issue_KPI__c} et la restriction de votre volume de ventes quotidien est leve, sous rserve que vous ne soyez sujet aucune autre restriction sur vos ventes.


Nous sommes heureux des amliorations que vous avez ralises et nous comptons sur vous pour les poursuivre. Pour vous tenir jour sur le processus de Probation Period et afin de vous assurer que votre compte est toujours en conformit, veuillez consulter l'article du Merchant Support Center ici. En complment, votre Seller Success Manager est disponible pour rpondre toutes les questions que vous pourriez avoir. 


Bravo !

Sincrement, 

Votre quipe Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_Body_MP_Saved_Policy_Violation
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Flicitations ! Vous tes maintenant entirement conforme la Charte qualit de Back Market. 

Votre Probation Period pour violations de nos rgles (policy violations) se termine aujourd'hui.


Pour vous assurer que votre compte est toujours en conformit, veuillez consulter l'article du Seller Support Center. En outre, votre contact Back Market est disponible pour rpondre toutes les questions que vous pourriez avoir.


Excellent travail !


Cordialement,

Votre quipe Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_Subject_MP_Saved_CSAT_LateResponse

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_FR_Subject_MP_Saved_Policy_Violation
textTemplates.text: Merci de avoir corrig vos policy violations !

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_Invoice_ENBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},
As mentioned in our previous notice dated {!BegunOn} you were called out as providing customers with invoices which do not comply with the legal requirements in force. You were granted until {!DateToday} to provide us with a proof of your compliance, which you failed to do so far.
We would like to remind you again of the importance of these requirements in order to meet legal obligations towards tax authorities.
As a consequence, the daily number of your sales is from now on limited to 30% of your average daily sales volume over the last 30 days, in accordance with article 17 of our T&Cs.
We therefore ask you, a last time, to make all the necessary changes and to provide proof of your compliance to your Seller Success Manager, in order to lift this sales limitation. Should you fail to provide it before {!ETA} we reserve the right to close your account, in accordance with article 18 of our T&Cs.
As a reminder, here are the mentions that must at least appear in each of your invoices:
Seller information - Social designation or name - Head office or home - SIRET N - Individual VAT identification number
Customer Information - Name and surname - Address
Billing details - Date - Invoice No.
Details on service provision - Operation date (if different from the invoice) - Quantity and precise designation of the good(s) sent - Price, taxes not included - Discounts (if applicable) - Delivery charges - VAT rate in force in the country of delivery - VAT amount - Total Amount, including VAT
If you are eligible to apply marginal VAT for the product sold, these last three points are not necessary but must be replaced by: - Mention 'VAT not applicable "Second-hand goods "'. - Total amount, VAT Included
All information is available in this FAQ article, do not hesitate to keep your Seller Success Manager informed of any difficulties encountered in updating your invoice template. https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360019750759-How-to-establish-a-B2C-invoice-that-is-compliant-with-the-law-
Thank you for your immediate attention, The Back Market Team

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_Invoice_ENSubject
textTemplates.text: Your invoices do not respect your legal requirements.

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_Invoice_FRBody
textTemplates.text:
Cher {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},
Comme indiqu dans notre e-mail du {!BegunOn} suite un audit sur les factures envoyes aux clients aprs leurs achats sur Back Market, nous nous sommes aperus que les documents envoys par vos quipes ne sont pas conformes aux exigences lgales en vigueur. Nous vous avons demand deffectuer lensemble des modifications ncessaires avant le {!DateToday} et dapporter la preuve de votre mise en conformit votre Seller Success Manager. Sauf erreur, nous navons pas reu la preuve requise.
Nous vous rappelons de nouveau limportance de ces exigences qui permettent de rpondre aux obligations lgales auprs des administrations fiscales.
Par consquent, votre volume de ventes journalires sur notre plateforme est dornavant limit 30% de votre volume de ventes journalier moyen sur les 30 derniers jours, conformment larticle 17 de nos CGV.
Nous ritrons une dernire fois, par la prsente, notre demande de vous voir effectuer lensemble des modifications ncessaires, et dapporter la preuve de votre mise en conformit votre Seller Success Manager afin que cette limite de ventes puisse tre leve. Faute pour vous dapporter cette preuve dici le {!ETA} nous nous rserverons le droit de procder la clture de votre compte, en accord avec larticle 18 de nos CGV.
Pour rappel, voici les mentions qui doivent a minima obligatoirement figurer dans chacune de vos factures :
Informations vendeur - Dsignation sociale ou nom - Sige social ou domicile - N SIRET - Numro individuel didentification la TVA
Informations client - Nom et prnom - Adresse
Dtail de facturation - Date - N de Facture
Dtail sur la prestation de service - Date dopration (si diffrente de la facture) - Quantit et dsignation prcise du/des bien(s) envoy(s) - Prix, taxes non incluses - Remises (si applicable) - Frais de livraison - Taux TVA en vigueur dans le pays de livraison - Montant de la TVA - Montant Total, TVA incluse
Si vous tes ligible pour le produit vendu appliquer une TVA sur marge, ces trois derniers points ne sont pas ncessaires mais doivent imprativement tre remplacs par : - Mention TVA non applicable Rgime particulier - Biens d'occasion - Montant total, TVA Incluse
Toutes les informations sont disponibles dans cet article FAQ, nhsitez pas tenir votre Seller Success Manager inform des difficults rencontres dans la mise jour de vos modles de facture. https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/fr/articles/360019750759-Comment-%C3%A9tablir-une-facture-B2C-conforme-%C3%A0-la-r%C3%A8glementation-
Merci pour votre implication, Lquipe Back Market.

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_Invoice_FRSubject
textTemplates.text: Vos factures de vente ne respectent pas vos obligations lgales.

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_MOP_EN_LastChance_Body
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Unfortunately, since we last reached out about your mystery order, we are sorry to inform you that your new mystery order on Back Market still did not meet the quality standards outlined in the Quality Charter. 


Please find attached the report link summarizing the details of your mystery order: {!Get_latest_MO.Link_to_the_MO__c}

Please find below the reason(s) for the failure of your mystery order: {!Get_latest_MO.Reason_for_failure__c}


Therefore, in accordance with Article 12 of our Terms and Conditions, your account is now entering the Last Chance period. The purpose of this Last chance is to ensure you integrate the recommended actions in your refurbishment and testing processes in order to meet the expected quality standards within 30 days. During this period, your sales account will be limited to {!$Record.AlertLimitation__c} sales per day (i.e. approximately 30% of your average daily sales volume made over the last 30 days), provided that you are not already subject to another stricter sales restriction during this period.


After this delay, we will place a new mystery order on your account. In the event that its results are not satisfactory (Inspection score below 80% or a critical quality standard is not met), we will close your account and our business relationship shall terminate, as provided for under Articles 12 and 18.2 of the Terms and Conditions.


For more information about Mystery order tests and scoring, as well as tools and levers to improve your refurbishing and testing processes, please consult the seller Support Center (find the link at the bottom).

Your Back Market contact is available to work with you to clarify and analyze the situation and jointly build an action plan to address issues. 


We value your presence on our platform as an esteemed partner, and we sincerely hope we can resolve the situation and avoid closing your account. Please feel free to reach out if you have additional questions.


Sincerely, 

Back Market

https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/en-gb/articles/4407217322130

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_MOP_EN_LastChance_Subject
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Back_Office_PK__c} - {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name} - Feedback Mystery Order - Last chance to meet Back Market quality standards

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_MOP_EN_Saved_Body
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Thanks to your effort, we are delighted to inform you that you have successfully passed our mystery order test and are in compliance with our quality standards. Mystery orders are a way for us to randomly check the quality of products and service offered to Back Market customers.


Any sales restrictions that have been imposed as a consequence of a prior failed mystery order have now been lifted provided that you are not subject to any other sales restriction.


Please find attached the report link summarizing the details of your mystery order: {!Get_latest_MO.Link_to_the_MO__c}


In the event you havent reached a 100% Inspection score, please find in the report a few points that could be improved in order to offer an even more exceptional service and products.

We encourage you to consult the seller Support Center to review the best practices and available resources to help in your efforts. Additionally, your Back Market contact is available to answer any remaining questions you may have.


Sincerely,

Back Market


https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/en-gb/articles/4407217322130

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_MOP_EN_Saved_Subject
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Back_Office_PK__c} - {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name} - Feedback Mystery Order - Your Mystery Order monitoring succeeded!

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_MOP_FR_LastChance_Body
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Depuis notre dernier contact au sujet des commandes mystres et du respect de nos normes qualit, les rsultats de la dernire commande mystre laquelle vous avez t sujet sur Back Market ne sont toujours pas en adquation avec nos normes qualit dcrites dans la Charte Qualit.


Vous trouverez ci-dessous le dtail de lanalyse de votre commande mystre: {!Get_latest_MO.Link_to_the_MO__c}

ainsi que les raisons de son chec: {!Get_latest_MO.Reason_for_failure__c}


Par consquent, conformment l'article 12 de nos Conditions gnrales de ventes, votre compte entre en priode de dernire chance . 


Le but de cette dernire chance est de vous donner lopportunit de parvenir aux normes de qualit attendues sous 30 jours. Pendant cette priode, votre compte sera, conformment aux articles 12 et 17 de nos CGV, limit {!$Record.AlertLimitation__c} ventes par jour (soit environ 30% de votre volume de ventes quotidien moyen ralis au cours des 30 derniers jours), sous rserve que vous ne soyez pas dj sujet aucune autre restriction similaire sur cette priode.


A lissue de ce dlai, nous effectuerons une nouvelle commande mystre. Dans le cas o le score final serait en dessous de 80% ou quune norme qualit importante ne serait pas respecte, nous fermerons votre compte vendeur sur notre plateforme et notre collaboration prendra fin, comme le prvoient les articles 12 et 18.2 de nos CGV. Nous esprons sincrement que nous n'en arriverons pas l et sommes votre disposition pour rpondre toute question. 


Pour plus d'informations sur votre indicateur dfaillant ainsi que les outils et leviers pour amliorer votre performance en reconditionnement, veuillez consulter notre centre dassistance marchands le seller Support Center (veuillez trouver le lien en fin de mail).


Votre contact Back Market est galement disponible pour travailler avec vous afin d'analyser la situation et d'laborer conjointement un plan d'action pour rsoudre les problmes rencontrs. 


Sincrement, 

Back Market

https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/fr/articles/4407217322130

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_MOP_FR_LastChance_Subject
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Back_Office_PK__c} - {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name} - Feedback Commande Mystre - Dernire chance pour rpondre aux normes de qualit Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_MOP_FR_Saved_Body
textTemplates.text:
Bonjour {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name},


Grce vos efforts, nous avons le plaisir de vous informer que vous avez russi notre test de Commande mystre et que vous tes en conformit avec nos normes de qualit. Les commandes mystres sont un moyen pour nous de contrler alatoirement le respect par les Vendeurs de leurs obligations rsultant de nos conditions gnrales vendeurs et leurs annexes, en particulier la Charte Qualit.


Toute restriction qui a pu tre applique suite lchec dune commande mystre est dsormais leve, (sous rserve que vous ne soyez sujet aucune autre restriction de vente).


Vous trouverez ci-dessous le dtail de lanalyse de votre commande mystre ainsi que ses recommandations : {!Get_latest_MO.Link_to_the_MO__c}


Dans le cas o vous n'auriez pas atteint un score d'inspection de 100%, vous trouverez dans ce rapport quelques points qui pourraient tre amliors afin d'offrir un service et une qualit produits irrprochables.


Nous vous recommandons de consulter le seller Support Center pour toute information concernant les meilleures pratiques de reconditionnement ainsi que toute autre ressource pouvant vous tre utile dans vos efforts. Votre contact Back Market reste bien entendu votre disposition pour toute question supplmentaire. 


Cordialement,

Back Market


https://merchant-support.backmarket.com/hc/fr/articles/4407217322130

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_MOP_FR_Saved_Subject
textTemplates.text: {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Back_Office_PK__c} - {!$Record.Business_Name__r.Name} - Feedback Commande Mystre - Le suivi de votre Commande Mystre est un succs!

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_US_Body_great_debt
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


We are sorry to notice that you have a negative balance in your Back Market wallet superior to $10k.


As a consequence, we hereby notify you, in accordance with article 18.2 of our sellers general terms and conditions, that, unless you regularize your account by paying the invoice available in the invoice tab of your Back Office on the Back Markets account (please specify your PK number and the invoice number as the reason for payment), we will close your seller account in 30 days as from today and our collaboration shall terminate.


After this 30-days period, you will therefore not be able to sell nor to buy back products on our websites. Of course, this notice period is subject to your strict respect of our general terms and conditions and of the Charter. As from tomorrow and until you regularize your account, your sale will be limited to 1 per day.


We remind you that all orders placed on our websites before the closure of your seller account must be executed in accordance with our general terms and conditions and the Charter.


As regards to after sale services and warranties, as from today, we will process all of the Buyers requests and complaints relating to you in your name and on your behalf, under the conditions set forth under articles 13 and 14 of our general terms and conditions for sellers.


Best regards,

Back Market

textTemplates.name: TextTemplate_US_Body_Limitation_Lift
textTemplates.text:
Hello,


Following our previous communication notifying you of a negative balance on your Back Market wallet superior to $10k, we notice that it decreased to a negative balance inferior to $5k. As a consequence, we hereby inform you that we are lifting the 1 sale per day limitation on your sales, and are reverting to the previous applicable limitation of {!$Record.Business_Name__r.LimitationBeforeAlert__c} sales per day.


We however kindly ask you again to regularize your account by paying the invoice available in the invoice tab of your Back Office. Please use the Back Market bank details to make such payment.


Please be informed that according to our general terms and conditions, if your account is not regularized before the end of the 30-day delay mentioned in our previous email, Back Market may close your seller account and take all legal actions to recover this amount plus interest for late payment and any applicable penalties.


Best regards,

Back Market
